name: Brussels Sprout Pakora
author: Glasgow Foodie
summary: Liven up boring Brussels sprouts with this recipe! Adjust the type and amount of chile pepper to your taste.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 cup water, or more as needed
directions: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add Brussels sprouts, cover, and steam until tender, about 5 minutes
Sift chickpea and rice flour together in a large bowl; mix in coriander, cumin, baking powder, salt, and black pepper
Whisk in enough water until pakora batter is the consistency of pancake batter
Stir in Brussels sprouts, cilantro, and chile peppers until combined
Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Scoop a few tablespoons of pakora batter at a time into the hot oil
